item.title: Commercial bins from flats obstructing footpath, 11th June
item.description:
A large number of overflowing bins from the block of flats on the footpath and road which means pedestrians have to walk past foul smelling bins for days. Please get them picked up asap. Its disgusting

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Amhurst Park, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: LArge over grown willow tree, 11th June
item.description:
I moved into my property 26a Albany close Bexley and reported this large overgrown tree and was told nothing will be done about this. But this is not my tree this is on your property and is majorly inpacting my garden and light . Firstly there is constant branches and leaves dropping constantly which is inpacting on my belongings getting ruined as they are bring coverred all day long in leaves and Branches I have dissabilities and I cannot be respsonsible for the upkeep of this problem. It is also inpacting on the light in my rooms causing the rooms to be very dark.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 24, Albany Close, Blendon, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Abandoned/Stolen vehicle, 11th June
item.description:
Hello, Please can I kindly ask you to look into vehicle OY13RXR. It's been abandoned for the past three months on our street. It has not moved at all, I have been keeping an eye on it. Based on how it looks on the inside, it's probably stolen and dumped here. Please can you check with the police and find out if it's stolen or just notify the keeper.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Escott Gardens, Elmstead, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Removal of trees not being replaced, 11th June
item.description:
A tree was cut down this morning on the pavement of number11 Selwyn Crescent. I would like to know if this tree is going to be replaced. I have noticed that trees that are cut down and removed are not replaced and the pavement badly covered over. The need for trees in residential sreets is more important now than ever. I guess if we were in Sidcup or Bexleyheath this would be different and the tree replaced please advise.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Selwyn Crescent, Welling, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Potential pavement defect, 11th June
item.description:
Pavement outside the St Anselm Church was replaced recently however since this, water has been leaking from the pavement to the basement below which is the church. Please can we request for this to be inspected and this pavement to be renewed.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Kingsway, Holborn, London
Report on FixMyStreet
